analysis.key_quote: This proposed new regulation would inject political interference into the research grant assessment and award process, destroying the scientific integrity of the federal grant award process and thereby devastating the most successful biomedical research program in the world.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and its negative impact on scientific integrity, which aligns with the themes of nonpartisan governance and the importance of objective review processes in federal research funding.
